title: test_user_login_functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully log in using the /api/auth/login endpoint with valid credentials and receive a valid JWT token.

title: test_user_registration_process
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully using the /api/auth/register endpoint and that the user data is stored correctly.

title: test_user_logout_functionality
description: Verify that a logged-in user can successfully log out using the /api/auth/logout endpoint and that the session or token is invalidated.

title: test_get_all_users_endpoint
description: Verify that the /api/users GET endpoint returns a list of all users with correct data and respects authorization rules.

title: test_create_user_endpoint
description: Verify that a new user can be created successfully using the /api/users POST endpoint with valid input data.

title: test_get_user_by_id_endpoint
description: Verify that the /api/users/{id} GET endpoint returns the correct user details for a valid user ID and handles invalid IDs gracefully.

title: test_update_user_endpoint
description: Verify that the /api/users/{id} PATCH endpoint updates user information correctly and validates input data.

title: test_get_all_partners_endpoint
description: Verify that the /api/partners GET endpoint returns a list of all partners with correct data and respects authorization rules.

title: test_create_partner_endpoint
description: Verify that a new partner can be created successfully using the /api/partners POST endpoint with valid input data.

title: test_get_current_partner_profile
description: Verify that the /api/partners/me GET endpoint returns the profile of the currently authenticated partner.
